segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on her task, it's almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet, trying not to get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking it, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, so patiently waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they've already taken.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, it's a nice view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman realizes what's happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just flowing and flowing, it's such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so sweet, just waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor now, it's really spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR
